SYN_BRONCH_1_1:
Procedure: Therapeutic Bronchoscopy.
Actions:
- LMA placed.
- Inspection: Y-stent in place. Significant mucus plugging (Right > Left > Trachea).
- RUL partially obstructed by SEMS tip.
- LUL tumor (40%) noted, not treated.
- Intervention: Mucus removed via suction, forceps, and bicarb instillation. Stents recanalized.
- BAL: LUL anterior segment (40cc in/30cc out).
- No bleeding.
Plan: PACU.
